long_description: Use the REI Campware nonstick cookset to create elaborate, delicious camp meals without the hassle of difficult, time-consuming cleanups. Cookset works well for campers who enjoy sauteing, frying, flipping pancakes and boiling water for pasta. Teflon(R) Classic coating provides excellent nonstick performance, making the post-meal cleanup a breeze. Rounded bottom edges allow easy cleaning and improve heating efficiency. Spiral pattern on the bottom of pots and fry pans grips stove and grill top. Pots and pans nest together for easy packing. Kit contains 3.2 liter and 2.2 liter pots with fry pan lids, pot gripper, 2 small camp towels and a mesh storage bag. Fry pan lids are 7.5 in. and 8.9 in. in diameter.
short_description: Use the REI Campware nonstick cookset to create elaborate, delicious camp meals without the hassle of difficult, time-consuming cleanups.
